attributes.action: I want the Government to offer all men over 50 a annual PSA test!
attributes.additional_details: My Great Grandad, Grandad and Dad all suffered from this form of cancer.  My Dad has had this cancer for 14 years.  Luckily, his cancer was caught early because my Mum forced him to go to the doctors when he had blood in his urine.  Some men are reluctant to go to the doctors if they present with symptoms.  The reason they need to get tested annually is because some men don’t have symptoms and if we can catch it early, treatment will be more successful.  A simple PSA blood test is all that is needed.
attributes.background: I want the government to offer annual PSA test to all men over 50!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require men over the age of 50 to be invited for a PSA test
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615500
